text: Tumi ki tadera dike ceye dekho ni yadera bala hayechila -- ''tomadera hata gutiye rakho, ebam namaya kayema karo, ara yakata adaya karo.’’ Kintu yakhana tadera jan'ya yud'dhera bidhana deya halo takhana, ascarya! Tadera ekati dala manusake bhaya karate lagalo yemana ucita allah‌ke bhaya kara, -- athaba tara ca'ite'o besi bhaya, ara balale -- ''amadera prabhu! Kena tumi amadera jan'ya yud'dhera bidhana karale? Kena tumi amadera alpakalera jan'ya birama dile na?’’ Tumi balo -- ''e'i duniyara ayojana alpaksanera jan'ya, ara parakala hacche ye bhaya kare tara jan'ya utkrstatara. Ara tomadera an'yaya kara habe na khejura-bicira-patala parata parimane'o
